Also called: Laa Boaltinn (Irish), Là Bealltainn (Scottish Gaelic), Laa Boaltinn/Boaldyn (Manx), Beltina; Beltina; Beltanië
Observed by: Gaels (moderne Ierse mense, Schotse mense en Manx mense), Wiccans, en Celtic neopagans
Tipe: Cultureel, Pagan (Celtic polytheism, Celtic Neopaganism, Wicca)
Celebrations: verlichting bonfires, decorating homes with May flowers, making May bushes, visiting holy wells, feasting
Datum: 1 Mei, (of 1 November in die S. Hemisfeer)
Verwanter tot: Mei Dag, Calan Mai, Walpurgis Night
